content:
FYI: Understanding the CMS Prior Authorization Rule and MCGâ€™s Vision to Address Burden Reduction
February 23, 2021 1pm - 2pm ET (10am - 11am PT)

https://info.mcg.com/webinar-understanding-cms-rule-feb-2021.html

If you are the developer for any FHIR IG that will be balloted in the January 2022 Ballot cycle, you must attend a webinar on November 3, 2021 from 1-2:30pm Eastern to review key dates and requirements for your IG to be approved to be included in the upcoming ballot cycle. You must register in advance for the meeting: https://hl7-org.zoom.us/meeting/register/tJApdu-vpzwuE9P8bn43pHE5FeJ2bwqpYhav. If you can not attend, please let Melva Peters know and she will send you the recording. If you do not attend, your FHIR IG may not be approved for the January 2022 Ballot.
